alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 1:49AM MST until December 07 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow, moderate at times, above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches below 7000 feet and 6 to 11 inches in the mountains above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph at times. * WHERE...Sawtooth region, Frank Church Wilderness, and Big Lost Highlands. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult especially over mountain passes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
